thread.title: Fletcher Technical Community College to Host Annual Bayou Region Job Fair on October 22 | Fletcher Technical Community College
thread.title_full: Fletcher Technical Community College to Host Annual Bayou Region Job Fair on October 22 | Fletcher Technical Community College

title: Fletcher Technical Community College to Host Annual Bayou Region Job Fair on October 22 | Fletcher Technical Community College
text:
Schriever, LA – Fletcher Technical Community College will host its Annual Bayou Region Job Fair on Wednesday, October 22, 2025, from 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. at the college’s main campus and new Workforce building in Schriever. In partnership with the Louisiana Workforce Commission, Fletcher is expanding support for job seekers and employers through on-site resources that help candidates transition to the workforce and help employers access available programs and benefits.
This fall event is open to both students and the public and will provide valuable networking opportunities across a wide range of industries. More than 60 employers are already registered, with representation that aligns with Fletcher’s academic divisions, including Energy and Advanced Technology, Business, Education, and Science, and Nursing and Allied Health.
Attendees will also be able to connect with four-year institutions that offer transfer pathways from associate to bachelor’s degree programs. Fletcher Enrollment Advisors will be on hand to answer questions about programs and the enrollment process.
A comprehensive list of participating employers will be posted to Fletcher’s website (www.fletcher.edu) prior to the Job Fair and will also be available to attendees upon arrival. To make the most of the day, Fletcher encourages participants to dress to make a strong first impression, bring multiple copies of a current résumé, and treat each conversation like an interview.
Food trucks will be available on site during the event, and Raising Cane’s will provide beverages.
Event Details
- What: Annual Bayou Region Job Fair
- When: Wednesday, October 22, 2025, 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.
- Where: Fletcher Technical Community College, Main Campus and Workforce Building, Schriever, Louisiana
- Who: Open to Fletcher students, alumni, and the public
- Partner: Louisiana Workforce Commission
For more information about Fletcher’s upcoming career fairs, contact Janel Ricca, Job Placement Director, at [[email protected]](https://www.fletcher.edu/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection).
